statements: SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule WHERE course_name = 'Mathematics';
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_date FROM CourseSchedule WHERE teacher_id = 101;
SELECT teacher_name, course_name FROM CourseSchedule WHERE course_date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT course_id, course_name, teacher_name FROM CourseSchedule ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, teacher_name FROM CourseSchedule ORDER BY course_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule ORDER BY course_date DESC, teacher_id
SELECT course_name, teacher_name FROM CourseSchedule WHERE course_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT course_id, course_name, teacher_name FROM CourseSchedule WHERE teacher_name LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT course_name, teacher_name FROM CourseSchedule WHERE teacher_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY course_name ASC
SELECT DISTINCT teacher_id, teacher_name FROM CourseSchedule ORDER BY teacher_name
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT teacher_name, teacher_specialization FROM teachers;
SELECT * FROM teachers WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT course_id, course_name, teacher_name, teacher_specialization FROM courses JOIN teachers ON courses.course_id = teachers.course_id;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT teacher_name, teacher_specialization, course_name FROM teachers JOIN courses ON teachers.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE teacher_id = 1;
SELECT teacher_name, course_name FROM teachers JOIN courses ON teachers.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE teacher_specialization = 'Mathematics' ORDER BY teacher_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, COUNT(teacher_id) AS num_teachers FROM teachers JOIN courses ON teachers.course_id = courses.course_id GROUP BY course_name HAVING num_teachers > 2;
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule;
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_description FROM CourseSchedule ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM CourseSchedule WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT teacher_name, teacher_email FROM Teacher ORDER BY teacher_name DESC;
SELECT course_id, teacher_id, assignment_date FROM CourseAssignment ORDER BY assignment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule WHERE course_id = 1
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM CourseSchedule WHERE course_id = 2
SELECT teacher_name, teacher_email FROM Teacher WHERE teacher_id = 3

SELECT course_name, teacher_name, assignment_date FROM CourseSchedule JOIN CourseAssignment ON CourseSchedule.course_id = CourseAssignment.course_id WHERE CourseSchedule.course_id = 1 AND CourseAssignment.teacher_id = 2
SELECT course_name, teacher_email FROM CourseSchedule JOIN CourseAssignment ON CourseSchedule.course_id = CourseAssignment.course_id WHERE assignment_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id > 2;
SELECT teacher_name, teacher_email FROM teachers WHERE teacher_id = 3;
SELECT course_name, course_description, teacher_name, start_date FROM courses JOIN course_schedule ON courses.course_id = course_schedule.course_id;
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_id, course_name, teacher_name FROM courses JOIN teacher_courses ON courses.course_id = teacher_courses.course_id JOIN teachers ON teacher_courses.teacher_id = teachers.teacher_id;

SELECT course_name, teacher_name, start_date, end_date FROM courses JOIN course_schedule ON courses.course_id = course_schedule.course_id JOIN teachers ON course_schedule.teacher_id = teachers.teacher_id;
SELECT teacher_name, teacher_email, course_name FROM teachers JOIN teacher_courses ON teachers.teacher_id = teacher_courses.teacher_id JOIN courses ON teacher_courses.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Course;
SELECT teacher_name, teacher_email FROM Teacher WHERE teacher_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT student_name FROM Student WHERE student_email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Course WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT teacher_name, teacher_email FROM Teacher WHERE teacher_id = 2;
SELECT course_name, course_description, teacher_name FROM Course JOIN CourseSchedule ON Course.course_id = CourseSchedule.course_id JOIN Teacher ON CourseSchedule.teacher_id = Teacher.teacher_id;
SELECT student_name, student_email, enrollment_date FROM Student JOIN Enrollment ON Student.student_id = Enrollment.student_id WHERE course_id = 3;
